author: geirm
msg: fix several cases of "it's" where it should be "its"

author: dlr
msg: Added header JavaDoc patch from Will Glass-Husain (with minor tweaks
by myself) which notes the @deprecated status of this class.  Use
VelocityViewServlet from the Velocity-Tools sub-project instead.

author: dlr
msg: initializeParserPool(): Formatting and log message tweaks.

author: dlr
msg: Stressed the importance of the parser.pool.size property.  Under
extremely high concurrency, too low a value for this property can
result in degraded performance and GC thrash.
